participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and energetic, enjoys socializing and engaging in sports.
participant_1.background: my mother is a dentist. i'm currently looking for a job preferably at a restaurant. i like playing basketball. my favourite artist is travis scott. i have one older sister.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and artistic, with a passion for music and a close-knit family.
participant_2.background: my favorite color is red. i am a christian. my sister is a pole dancer. i enjoy listening to classical music. i can drive a tractor.
